Name: Dead TD
About the game: Dead TD is a tower defense game that was inspired by the old school original maps. It features a wide range of towers that upgrade into more powerful types and features a range of different abilities that can be used to create the ultimate defense. Build and Block using Towers! Create a maze or redirect monsters to group them up! Pick from 8 Base Towers! Each tower having 3 possible upgrade paths! Level up a hero, with 3 different classes, each with a variety of skills! Battle against a variety of monsters including flying, stealth, immune, and attacking! Currently features 12 levels, endless mode, and option for hardmode. Those interested can also utilize the map editor to create their own levels!
